TEXT.TITLE: REFCO SAYS NOT IN FINANCIAL DIFFICULTY
TEXT.BODY: Refco Inc denied it is having financial difficulties and said it did not halt oil futures trading today, John O'Connell, assistant vice president of research told Reuters. Reuter
